requirementErrors.issue: Không đọc context "we don't get snow"
Bỏ qua động từ hành động
Không quan sát cấu trúc fountain

technicalErrors.error: Đàn ông mặc bikini thay vì quần bơi
Quân cờ nhảy đánh nhau, không theo luật
Tuần lộc tách đàn, đứng sai vị trí

qcChecklist: Đủ số lượng output theo yêu cầu?
Mặt người không bị biến dạng?
Chuyển động tự nhiên, không giật?
Độ phân giải đúng yêu cầu?
Xem lại toàn bộ video từ đầu đến cuối?

promptGuide.title: Chuyển động nhóm đối tượng sai
promptGuide.case: TLNOV14022rev4 - Tuần lộc tách đàn, đứng sai vị trí
promptGuide.badPrompt: Santa's reindeer flying over the rooftop with sleigh
promptGuide.goodPrompt:
[SCENE]
Santa Claus riding a sleigh pulled by a team of reindeer 
flying across the night sky above a snow-covered rooftop.

[MOTION CONSTRAINTS]
- All reindeer MUST maintain V-formation throughout
- Reindeer spacing: consistent 1-meter gap between each
- Movement direction: unified left-to-right trajectory
- No individual reindeer breaks away from formation
- Sleigh follows directly behind the lead reindeer

[CAMERA]
Fixed wide shot, no movement, no shake.

[NEGATIVE]
Avoid: reindeer separating, reindeer behind sleigh, 
broken formation, erratic individual movement.
promptGuide.workflow: Kling 2.6 Pro (motion control) → KlingO1 Edit (fix nếu còn lệch nhẹ)

promptGuide.title: Trang phục sai ngữ cảnh
promptGuide.case: NHJAN13010 - Đàn ông mặc bikini thay vì quần bơi
promptGuide.badPrompt: Man swimming in the pool wearing swimwear
promptGuide.goodPrompt:
[SUBJECT]
Adult Caucasian man, athletic build, standing by poolside.

[CLOTHING - EXPLICIT]
Wearing: men's knee-length swim trunks / board shorts
Color: solid navy blue or black
Style: casual beach/pool appropriate for adult male

[ABSOLUTE RESTRICTIONS]
NOT wearing: bikini, speedo, brief-style swimwear, 
women's swimwear, revealing clothing.

[ACTION]
Natural relaxed pose, one hand on hip, slight smile.

[CAMERA]
Medium shot, fixed angle, eye level.
promptGuide.workflow: Chỉ định CỤ THỂ loại trang phục + Mô tả màu sắc, kiểu dáng + Nêu rõ giới tính phù hợp + Thêm negative prompt loại trừ

promptGuide.title: Hành vi người không phù hợp
promptGuide.case: MNJAN2001 - Người trong bếp cử chỉ gợi cảm
promptGuide.goodPrompt:
[SCENE]
Modern open-concept kitchen, daytime, warm lighting.

[SUBJECTS]
- Person A: Woman, 35-40 years old, standing at counter
- Person B: Man, 35-40 years old, standing near stove

[ACTIONS - SPECIFIC]
Person A: chopping vegetables on cutting board, 
eyes focused on hands, slight smile.

Person B: stirring pot with wooden spoon, 
occasionally glancing at Person A with friendly expression.

[BODY LANGUAGE CONSTRAINTS]
- Maintain 2-feet distance between subjects
- No physical contact
- Hands occupied with cooking tasks
- Posture: upright, casual, task-focused
- Eye contact: brief, friendly, not prolonged

[MOOD]
Family-friendly, casual cooking session, 
wholesome domestic atmosphere.

[NEGATIVE]
Avoid: romantic gestures, suggestive poses, 
lingering eye contact, physical touching, 
leaning toward each other intimately.

promptGuide.title: Logic chuyển động vật thể sai
promptGuide.case: LIJAN07001 - Quân cờ nhảy đánh nhau thay vì đi theo luật
promptGuide.goodPrompt:
[SCENE]
Overhead view of wooden chessboard with ongoing game.

[CHESS MOVEMENT SEQUENCE - EXPLICIT]
Move 1: White pawn E2 slides forward to E4 (2 squares)
        Duration: 1.5 seconds, Pause: 1 second
        
Move 2: Black pawn D7 slides forward to D5 (2 squares)
        Duration: 1.5 seconds, Pause: 1 second
        
Move 3: White bishop F1 slides diagonally to B5
        Duration: 2 seconds

[MOVEMENT RULES]
- ONE piece moves at a time, others completely still
- Pieces SLIDE smoothly along board surface
- No jumping (except knights)
- No floating or lifting off board
- No piece disappears or duplicates

[NEGATIVE]
Avoid: pieces fighting, pieces jumping randomly,
multiple pieces moving simultaneously.

promptGuide.title: Nguồn nước xuất hiện sai vị trí
promptGuide.case: DUJAN04005 - Nước chảy ngẫu nhiên, không từ vòi phun
promptGuide.goodPrompt:
[SCENE]
Stone fountain barrel/basin in garden setting, 
currently empty, daylight.

[WATER SOURCE - EXPLICIT]
Water emerges ONLY from the fountain spout/nozzle 
at the TOP CENTER of the barrel structure.

[WATER BEHAVIOR]
- Water streams downward from spout
- Falls naturally into basin below
- Creates realistic splash on impact
- Ripples spread outward from impact point
- Water level gradually rises in basin

[PHYSICS CONSTRAINTS]
- Water obeys gravity: flows DOWN only
- No water appearing from sides of barrel
- No water materializing mid-air
- Flow rate: steady, moderate stream

[NEGATIVE]
Avoid: water from nowhere, water from walls,
floating water, reverse gravity, dry spout.

promptGuide.title: Chuyển mùa sai context
promptGuide.case: TADEC31004 - Làm tuyết→xuân thay vì hiện trạng→xuân
promptGuide.goodPrompt:
[STARTING STATE]
Current condition of the house exterior:
- Dry grass, brownish-yellow lawn
- Bare trees with no leaves
- Overcast sky
- NO SNOW (this location does not have snow)

[ENDING STATE]
Spring transformation:
- Lush green grass covering lawn
- Trees full of fresh green leaves
- Flowers blooming across garden
- Blue sky with soft clouds

[CRITICAL CONSTRAINT]
- START with current DRY condition
- DO NOT add snow at any point
- This is a warm climate location

[NEGATIVE]
Avoid: snow, ice, frost, winter elements.
promptGuide.workflow: Context Checklist: Khách hàng ở vùng khí hậu nào? Có tuyết không? Mùa hiện tại trong ảnh là gì? Mùa mục tiêu là gì?

promptGuide.title: Mặt người biến dạng
promptGuide.goodPrompt:
[SUBJECT FACE PROTECTION]
- Maintain consistent facial structure throughout
- Eyes: symmetrical, natural blink rate
- Mouth: natural movement, no morphing
- Skin texture: consistent, no artifacts
- Face proportions: stable, no warping

[MOTION LIMITS FOR FACES]
- Head rotation: maximum 30 degrees
- No rapid head movements
- Subtle expressions only

[NEGATIVE]
Avoid: face melting, asymmetrical features,
extra limbs, distorted proportions.
promptGuide.workflow: Kling 2.6 Pro với face protection → Review từng 1-2 giây → KlingO1 Edit fix local nếu lỗi nhẹ → Re-generate segment nếu lỗi nặng

promptGuide.title: Video tĩnh, thiếu chuyển động
promptGuide.case: THJAN20030Rev - Trời xanh như ảnh tĩnh zoom vào
promptGuide.goodPrompt:
[SKY REPLACEMENT]
Transform overcast sky to vibrant blue sky.

[SKY DYNAMICS - ESSENTIAL]
- Soft white clouds drifting slowly left-to-right
- Cloud shadows moving gently across landscape
- Birds flying in distant background (2-3 birds)

[ENVIRONMENTAL RESPONSE]
- Tree leaves rustling slightly in breeze
- Grass blades swaying gently
- Soft shadows shifting on ground

[CAMERA]
Fixed position, NO zoom, NO dolly.
Only environmental elements move.

[NEGATIVE]
Avoid: static sky, frozen clouds, 
no environmental movement, Ken Burns effect only.
promptGuide.workflow: Anti-Static Rule: Thêm cloud movement + leaf/grass rustle + shadow shift + distant birds. KHÔNG chỉ zoom vào ảnh tĩnh.

preGenerateChecklist: Đọc brief 2 lần, highlight từ khóa hành động
Xác định context địa lý/thời tiết
Liệt kê TẤT CẢ deliverables cần làm
Chọn công cụ phù hợp loại effect
Mô tả hành động ĐỘNG TỪ cụ thể
Chỉ định giới hạn vật lý/logic
postGenerateChecklist: Xem video từ đầu đến cuối (không skip)
Kiểm tra mặt người từng segment
So sánh với brief gốc lần cuối
